sentences.en: As you lower your pen whilst continuing the motion, you should notice the resulting shape is more regular than it otherwise would have been.
sentences.cn: 随着你降低你的笔，同时保持圆周运动，你应该会注意到画出的形状比起不这样做画出的形状要规范的多。

sentences.en: Enhanced: Enhance their existing skills whilst building new ones.
sentences.cn: 强化他们现有的能力及开发新的潜能.

sentences.en: Fixed crash if user retires whilst on the Jobs screen.
sentences.cn: 修正了玩家退休时在工作界面出现崩溃.

sentences.en: He was at his happiest whilst playing cricket.
Indeed, it is important to keep fit and healthy, whilst we all aspire to improve the way we look and feel in order to make good first and lasting impressions.
sentences.cn: 事实上，为了得到一个良好的初次印象和持续印象，在保持体形和健康的同时，我们也渴望提高自己看待和感受他人的方式。

sentences.en: Modules participate in a dynamic life cycle which includes the ability to add, update and remove modules at runtime, whilst preserving the state in the system.
sentences.cn: 模块参与到动态的生命周期里，这个动态的生命周期能够在运行时添加、更新、删除模块，同时保留系统中的状态。

sentences.en: The firm will be able to undercut its competitors whilst still making a profit.
sentences.cn: 该公司将得以把价格压得低于竞争对手而仍能盈利。

sentences.en: There was dead silence in the court, whilst the white rabbit read out these verses.
sentences.cn: 当白兔子念诗的时候,法庭上鸦雀无声.

sentences.en: UD elements make it possible to correct aberrations whilst maintaining low weight.
sentences.cn: UD的元素有可能纠正色差,同时保持低体重.

sentences.en: Whilst he was laid up, Gerald come to see him.
sentences.cn: 卧床期间, 杰罗尔德前来看望他.

sentences.en: Whilst I disagree with you on this matter, I respect your choice.
sentences.cn: 尽管在这件事上我与你意见不同, 可我还是尊重你的选择.

sentences.en: Whilst I used to laugh it off, I'm now getting irritated by it.
sentences.cn: 这种事情我从前会付之一笑，但现在开始觉得挺烦的。

sentences.en: Whilst playing badminton, I ruptured my Achilles tendon.
sentences.cn: 打羽毛球时，我的跟腱撕裂了。

sentences.en: Whilst talking to Lucy, she kept a sharp eye on the door.
sentences.cn: 她在和露西谈话的时候，眼睛就一直死盯着门口。

sentences.en: Whilst talking to Rose, she kept a sharp eye on the door.
sentences.cn: 她在和路丝谈话的时候, 眼睛就一直死盯着门口.

sentences.en: Whilst the detoxification requires energy, slow decay may still occur.
sentences.cn: 由于解毒作用需要能量, 所以缓慢的腐朽仍然会发生.

sentences.en: Whilst this might sound like a truism, it is nevertheless a crucial problem to address.
sentences.cn: 尽管这可能听起来像是老生常谈，但却是待解决的重要问题。

trans.tran_cn: 在…期间，与…同时，然而，尽管
